title: South Dakota Board of Chiropractic Examiners | South Dakota Department of Health
description: The SD Board of Chiropractic Examiners regulates chiropractor licensure and practices regulated by enforcement of updated SD laws and board policies.
cleaned_text: The mission of the South Dakota Board of Chiropractic Examiners is threefold: to protect the continuing health, welfare, and safety of consumers of chiropractic services by ensuring that qualified chiropractors are licensed and their practice is regulated by enforcement of updated statutes, rules, regulations, and board policies, including continuing education and consumer complaint processing. [Contact the Board](/licensing-and-records/boards/chiropractic/contact/) [Make a Complaint](/licensing-and-records/boards/chiropractic/complaints/) [Licensee Portal](https://bocelicensing.appssd.sd.gov/) Find Administrative Rule and Codified Laws on chiropractic examiners through the South Dakota Legislature. [View ARSD 20:41](https://sdlegislature.gov/Rules/Administrative/20:41) [View SDCL 36-5](https://sdlegislature.gov/Statutes/36-5) Marcia 57078 Phone: [605-668-9017](tel:6056689017) Fax: [605-668-9017](tel:6056689017) [sdbce@iw.net](mailto:sdbce@iw.net) License Verification Verify the license of a chiropractor. Licensing Requirements Find forms and instructions for chiropractic licensure. Calendar & Meeting Minutes Find an upcoming meeting or review archived meeting minutes. ADA Policy Find information about board service accommodations for those with disabilities. Continuing Education Review continuing education requirements to renew a license. Peer Review Requests The board may act as a peer review committee. Preceptor Requirements Apply for chiropractic preceptor programs.
